# is-typedarray [![locked](https://badges.github.io/stability-badges/dist/locked.svg)](https://github.com/badges/stability-badges)

Detect whether or not an object is a
[Typed Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Typed_arrays).

## Usage

[![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/is-typedarray.png)](https://nodei.co/npm/is-typedarray/)

### isTypedArray(array)

Returns `true` when array is a Typed Array, and `false` when it is not.
